div.p: I Hereby Certify that an Independent Volunteer Company has been raised in the Town of Gallatin Sumner County numbering about Fifty Strong rank & file called the Clay Guards & that they are in Complete uniform & regulaily regularly organized having Elected their officer & given under my hand at Gallatin this 28th May 1844.
